name: Introduction to Economics
description: An introductory course to Economics, covering basic concepts such as supply and demand, economic growth, and fiscal policy.

name: Intermediate Economics
description: An intermediate course in Economics, covering more complex topics such as economic cycles, monetary policy, and economic theory.

name: Macroeconomics
description: A course in Macroeconomics, covering topics such as international economics, macroeconomic policy, and economic forecasting.
